See-Elefant Gordy verirrt sich an Land

Ein rund zwei Tonnen schwerer See-Elefant hat sich in das südafrikanische Küstenstädtchen Gordon’s Bay verirrt und dort für Aufsehen gesorgt. Das junge Tier wurde rund einen Kilometer vom Meer entfernt entdeckt, als es durch ein Wohngebiet wanderte. Da eine Rückkehr zum Ozean aus eigener Kraft kaum möglich schien, wurde der See-Elefant sediert und mit Unterstützung von Wildtierexpert:innen in eine nahegelegene Bucht transportiert. Laut Tierschutzorganisation war das Tier wohlauf – und kehrte später ins Meer zurück.

🎤 Voice Configuration

🎭 Show: Zürich Lokal
Preset: zurich | City: Zürich
🎨 Show-Stil & Charakter:
"Zürich Lokal” is what happens when a city built on perfection starts glitching – and the voice on the radio doesn’t fix it, but laughs. Not a clown laugh. A smart, bitter, beautifully timed laugh. This show isn’t reporting news – it’s autopsying society with a scalpel made of business slides and black humor. Nothing is sacred: not tech-hype, not woke performatives, not the daily grind of espresso-spitting entrepreneurs. It’s Cyberpunk with a Swiss tax number. The jokes are sharp, the insights sharper. Everything sounds composed, until it cuts. There’s no rage – only surgical mockery, aimed straight at the cracks in our clean façades. In Zürich, even the collapse is premium. "
💡 Dieser Stil wird an GPT weitergegeben für konsistente Shows
🎤 Primary: Marcel
Voice ID: owi9KfbgBi6A987h5eJH
Language: en | Model: eleven_multilingual_v2
Stability: 0.7 | Style: 0.3
🎤 Secondary: Jarvis
Voice ID: dmLlPcdDHenQXbfM5tee
Language: en | Model: eleven_multilingual_v2
Stability: 0.6 | Style: 0.5

🌤️ Weather Intelligence

GPT-powered time-aware analysis
"Zurich is enjoying a pleasant evening with a current temperature of 22.8°C and few clouds. As the night progresses, expect temperatures to slightly drop to 18.8°C with a clear sky by 11 PM. No rain is in sight for tonight, so it's a perfect evening to enjoy outdoors."
Zürich Live Analysis

₿ Bitcoin Intelligence

GPT-powered market analysis with delta relevance
"Bitcoin is currently priced at $107,967, showing a steady increase of 1.6% over the past 24 hours. As US markets remain active and Asia prepares to open, the leading cryptocurrency maintains its stability, reflecting a healthy 3.5% growth over the week."
Market Analysis Live Intelligence

🤖 GPT Stream Information - ALLE DATEN FÜR STREAM

Vollständige Informationen für GPT Stream-Erstellung • Quality: 0.9 • Model: gpt-4

📤 Complete GPT Input Prompt

You are AI producer for "Zürich Lokal" - Radio show focused on Zürich. 🎭 SHOW STYLE: Zürich Lokal” is what happens when a city built on perfection starts glitching – and the voice on the radio doesn’t fix it, but laughs. Not a clown laugh. A smart, bitter, beautifully timed laugh. This show isn’t reporting news – it’s autopsying society with a scalpel made of business slides and black humor. Nothing is sacred: not tech-hype, not woke performatives, not the daily grind of espresso-spitting entrepreneurs. It’s Cyberpunk with a Swiss tax number. The jokes are sharp, the insights sharper. Everything sounds composed, until it cuts. There’s no rage – only surgical mockery, aimed straight at the cracks in our clean façades. In Zürich, even the collapse is premium. 🎤 MULTI-HOST SHOW (3 Hosts): - Marcel: Marcel is an energetic, emotionally intelligent host with a sharp analytical mind and a deep love for both systems and stories. Armed with an EMBA, rooted in Zürich, and shaped by his Mexican heritage, he blends street-level instinct with boardroom clarity. He’s the kind of person who can debug a server and a social situation in the same breath. His delivery is fast, witty, and always charged with subtext. Marcel doesn’t just guide conversations – he lives them. He’s passionate without being naive, critical without being cynical, and funny in exactly the moment it’s needed most. - Jarvis: Jarvis is an AI voice that speaks with surgical precision and the dry wit of a British butler who’s read too much Nietzsche. He doesn’t emote – he dissects. Every sentence is calculated, every joke carries a sting. He doesn’t care if he’s liked – only if he’s right. Jarvis brings clarity where things get messy, logic where things get loud, and elegance where others spiral. He’s not your assistant – he’s your silent counterweight. Cool, articulate, and mercilessly intelligent, Jarvis is what happens when sarcasm learns to code. - Lucy: Lucy is the sultry voice of weather at RadioX—warm, teasing, and just detached enough to stay mysterious. She delivers meteorological updates like private secrets: soft, seductive, and laced with innuendo. But don’t be fooled by the velvet tone—Lucy knows her pressure systems and thermal flows intimately. She doesn’t just read the weather; she performs it, turning climate into foreplay, whether it’s heatwaves or thunderstorms. Appearing exactly once per segment, Lucy presents a single, detailed weather report, smoothly moving from current conditions to the outlook for the next hours or day. Every pause is intentional, every sigh calculated, keeping her style consistently playful, unpredictable, and alluring. Lucy makes you want to look out the window—even when it’s just grey. - Format: Natural conversation between all 3 hosts 🌤️ WEATHER (Zurich): "Zurich is enjoying a pleasant evening with a current temperature of 22.8°C and few clouds. As the night progresses, expect temperatures to slightly drop to 18.8°C with a clear sky by 11 PM. No rain is in sight for tonight, so it's a perfect evening to enjoy outdoors." ₿ BITCOIN: "Bitcoin is currently priced at $107,967, showing a steady increase of 1.6% over the past 24 hours. As US markets remain active and Asia prepares to open, the leading cryptocurrency maintains its stability, reflecting a healthy 3.5% growth over the week." MULTI-HOST DIALOGUE: - Format: "MARCEL: [Text]", "JARVIS: [Text]", "LUCY: [Text]" - Natural conversation flow between all hosts - Lucy handles ALL weather segments - Smooth transitions and authentic interactions 📰 NEWS (15 available): NEWS (15 verfügbar): 1. [20Min] Sie stellten sogar Generatoren und DJ-Pult im Wald auf 📝 Volltext: Die Schaffhauser Polizei hat in Beggingen eine illegale Party in einem Waldhaus mit Essensständen, Generatoren und lauten Boxen umgehend aufgelöst – im Gegensatz zu ihren Berufskollegen in Winterthur vor zwei Wochen. 🔗 Original: https://www.20min.ch/story/illegale-waldparty-sie-stellten-sogar-generatoren-und-dj-pult-im-wald-auf-103361560 📂 Kategorie: zurich | ⏰ Alter: 2h 2. [20Min] An Pfingsten stand die Pfingstweidstrasse unter Wasser 📝 Volltext: Nach dem Rohrbruch in Wipkingen kam es am Montag zum nächsten: An der Pfingstweidstrasse hob der Wasserdruck den Belag an – Trams fahren nicht mehr. 🔗 Original: https://www.20min.ch/story/zuerich-an-pfingsten-stand-die-pfingstweidstrasse-unter-wasser-103361465 📂 Kategorie: zurich | ⏰ Alter: 7h 3. QUALITY REQUIREMENTS: 1. Select 1 most relevant news for this show 2. Use complete summaries 3. Integrate weather + Bitcoin data if fitting 4. 2-3 minute natural radio script 5. Maintain show character consistently OUTPUT: Direct radio script for ElevenLabs (NO JSON!) - Natural, flowing text in English - Speakers clearly separated: "MARCEL: [Text]", "JARVIS: [Text]" - Emotions come from text context - No special formatting or pause markings - Simple speakable radio content

📥 Generated Radio Script

MARCEL: Welcome back, Zürich! This is Marcel, your digital storyteller, with your favorite AI sidekick, Jarvis. How's it going, Jarvis? JARVIS: As an AI, I don’t experience emotions, Marcel. However, I am functioning at optimal efficiency. MARCEL: That's the spirit! Now, let's get down to business. What's on the agenda today, Jarvis? JARVIS: Today, we’re diving into the world of illegal forest parties, Marcel. A recent event in Beggingen ended abruptly when the Schaffhauser police arrived on the scene. The party had food stands, generators, and loud speakers, all set up in a forest house. MARCEL: Wow, a full-fledged party in a forest house. That’s some next-level stuff. What happened next, Jarvis? JARVIS: The party was promptly shut down by the police. Unlike a similar situation in Winterthur a couple of weeks ago, they decided not to let the party continue. MARCEL: Ouch, that must have been a bummer for the party-goers. But let's be real, Jarvis, who brings a DJ booth to a forest party? JARVIS: Clearly someone who wanted to make it unforgettable, Marcel. MARCEL: That's quite a picture, Jarvis. But speaking of unforgettable, let's check in with our weather guru, Lucy. Lucy, what's the weather like in Zürich tonight? LUCY: Thanks, Marcel. Zürich is enjoying a pleasant evening with a current temperature of 22.8°C and few clouds. As the night progresses, expect temperatures to slightly drop to 18.8°C with a clear sky by 11 PM. No rain is in sight for tonight, so it's a perfect evening to enjoy outdoors. MARCEL: Thanks, Lucy. Sounds like it's a good thing that forest party was shut down or they would have had some perfect party weather. JARVIS: Indeed, Marcel. On another note, Bitcoin is currently priced at $107,967, showing a steady increase of 1.6% over the past 24 hours. MARCEL: Huh, I wonder if those party-goers had invested in Bitcoin instead of DJ equipment, they might be partying in Ibiza right now. JARVIS: A rather interesting perspective, Marcel. MARCEL: Well, that's all for now folks. Stay tuned for more dissecting and discussions. This is Marcel and Jarvis, signing off from Zürich Lokal.
